titles.title: State Strategic Stockpile Act of 2023
State Strategic Stockpile Act of 2023

A bill to reauthorize and improve the pilot program to support State medical stockpiles, to ensure that State, local, Tribal, and territorial public health departments or officials are consulted by the Public Health Emergency Medical Countermeasures Enterprise, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committee.name: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

bill.summary:
State Strategic Stockpile Act of 2023
This bill reauthorizes through FY2028 grants that support states with establishing, expanding, and maintaining stockpiles of medical supplies for use during declared disasters or emergencies.
